mapper.select: select TEAM_INDEX, TEAM_DEPT_INDEX, TEAM_NAME, TEAM_WORK_TYPE from team

select EMP_INDEX, EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_PWD, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_ADDRESS, EMP_PHONE, EMP_BIRTH, EMP_INTRO, EMP_PHOTO, EMP_ENTRY_DATE, EMP_RANK_INDEX, EMP_TEAM_INDEX, EMP_POSITION_INDEX, EMP_BANK_NAME, EMP_ACCOUNT_NUMBER, EMP_VACATION, EMP_SALARY from emp
